items.title: Server Core
items.details: JavaEE-based web application which offers the ohmage 2.x API platform

items.title: Native Android app
items.details: Native android apk library for ohmage 2.x. Written in java

items.title: ohmageX
items.details: HTML5 and javascript-based data collection tool which is built for iOS and Android with phonegap, but can also be run from a browser.

items.title: Campaign Monitor
items.details: Campaign progress tracking tool written with HTML5, javascript and dc.js/d3. Helps project coordinators track the data collection of their participants

items.title: Interactive Dashboard
items.details: An interactive dashboard written in HTML5, javascript and dc.js/d3 which incorporates the overview first; zoom and filter; details on-demand design pattern.

items.title: Plot App
items.details: R-based data exploration tool written in HTML5, javascript and uses the opencpu server for data processing. Allows for complex data analysis without requiring technical expertise. Requires opencpu.

items.title: Class Setup
items.details: Class creation tool in HTML5 and javascript. Catered toward the Mobilize/LAUSD use-case, but enables easy class creation for all.

items.title: Campaign Authoring
items.details: Interactive campaign creation in HTML5 and javascript. Allows project coordinators to quickly define campaigns, which as the container for surveys, are the cornerstone of the ohmage system.

items.title: GWT Web frontend
items.details: The classic ohmage 2.x frontend written with Google Web Toolkit. Provides the ability for users to view history of responses as well as lists of classes and campaigns to which they belong.
